targets.query:
DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
   )
|> group() 



ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)


RunningMins=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)



Performance=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, on: RunningMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on == 0.0 or float(v:$idealRunrate) == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else (r._value_good/r._value_on)/float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Performance"
    }))
|> yield(name: "Performance")

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )
  |> group()


StatusData=
  DeviceData
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )

RunningMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: r._time,
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> cumulativeSum()
  
IdleMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: 1.0 - r._value,
     _time: r._time,
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> cumulativeSum()

Availability=
  join(
    tables: {on: RunningMins, off: IdleMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on+r._value_off == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_on/(r._value_on+r._value_off),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Availability"
    }))


ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Good Items"}))

ItemCountBadData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_BAD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Bad Items"}))

Quality=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, bad: ItemCountBadData},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_good+r._value_bad == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_good/(r._value_good+r._value_bad),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Quality"
    }))


Performance=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, on: RunningMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on == 0.0 or float(v:$idealRunrate) == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else (r._value_good/r._value_on)/float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Performance"
    }))


AxQ=
  join(
    tables: {a:Availability, q: Quality},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value_a * r._value_q,
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "AxQ"
    }))

OEE=
  join(
    tables: {axq:AxQ, p: Performance},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value_axq * r._value_p,
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "OEE"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "OEE")

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData"
 and r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )


StatusData=
  DeviceData
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )

RunningMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: r._time
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> sum()

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
 |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)


IdleMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: 1.0 - r._value,
     _time: r._time
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)
  
Availability=
  join(
    tables: {on: RunningMins, off: IdleMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on+r._value_off == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_on/(r._value_on+r._value_off),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Availability"
    }))
|> yield(name: "Availability")

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )


StatusData=
  DeviceData
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )

RunningMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: r._time,
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> cumulativeSum()
  
IdleMins=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: 1.0 - r._value,
     _time: r._time,
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> cumulativeSum()

Availability=
  join(
    tables: {on: RunningMins, off: IdleMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on+r._value_off == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_on/(r._value_on+r._value_off),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Availability"
    }))



RunStatus=
  StatusData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Running"
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)

union(tables: [RunStatus, Availability])
|> keep(columns: ["_field","_value","_time"])
|> group(columns:["_field"], mode: "by")
|>yield()

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )
|> group()
ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)

ItemCountBadData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_BAD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)

Quality=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, bad: ItemCountBadData},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_good+r._value_bad == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_good/(r._value_good+r._value_bad),
     _time: r._time
    }))
Quality

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )
|> group()

ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  
  
  
ItemCountGoodDataWindowed=
  ItemCountGoodData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Good Items"}))
//  |> yield(name: "Good Items")

ItemCountGoodDataCumulative=
  ItemCountGoodData
  |> cumulativeSum()

ItemCountBadData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_BAD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)

ItemCountBadDataWindowed=
  ItemCountBadData
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Bad Items"}))
//  |> yield(name: "Bad Items")

ItemCountBadDataCumulative=  
  ItemCountBadData
  |> cumulativeSum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Bad Items"}))

Quality=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodDataCumulative, bad: ItemCountBadDataCumulative},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_good+r._value_bad == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else r._value_good/(r._value_good+r._value_bad),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Quality"
    }))
//  |> yield(name: "Quality")

union(tables: [ItemCountBadDataWindowed, ItemCountGoodDataWindowed, Quality])
|> keep(columns: ["_field","_value","_time"])
|> group(columns:["_field"], mode: "by")
|>yield()


IdealRunrate=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "IdealRunrate"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "IdealRunrate")

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
   )
|> group() 



ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)


RunningMins=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: r._value,
     _time: now()
    }))
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1m)



Performance=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, on: RunningMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on == 0.0 or float(v:$idealRunrate) == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else (r._value_good/r._value_on)/float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "Performance"
    }))
|> yield(name: "Performance")

DeviceData=from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData" and 
    r.Source == "[[Source]]"
  )
  |> group()


ItemCountGoodData=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "ITEM_COUNT_GOOD"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> cumulativeSum()

RunningMins=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max)
  |> cumulativeSum()
//|>yield(name: "runningmins")

Performance=
  join(
    tables: {good: ItemCountGoodData, on: RunningMins},
    on: ["_time"]
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: if r._value_on == 0.0 or float(v:$idealRunrate) == 0.0 then 0.0 
             else (r._value_good/r._value_on)/float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time, _value_on : r._value_on, _value_good: r._value_good,
     _field: "Performance"
    }))
|> yield(name: "Performance")

IdealRunrate=
  DeviceData
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._field == "STATUS"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
     _value: float(v:$idealRunrate),
     _time: r._time,
     _field: "IdealRunrate"
    }))
  |> yield(name: "IdealRunrate")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData"
  )

|> keep(columns:["Source"])
  |> distinct(column: "Source")
list.label: Machine
list.name: Source
list.query:
from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "DeviceData"
  )

|> keep(columns:["Source"])
  |> distinct(column: "Source")
